content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"According to the EPAM policy, customer email addresses (non-EPAM email accounts) cannot be included into the EPAM distribution lists as these lists are intended to group the EPAM employees accounts only.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn how to manage DG membership lists (add/remove EPAM user domain accounts) from document\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/_layouts/15/WopiFrame.aspx?sourcedoc=/project/epm-help/Shared%20Documents/PMC%20Instructions/EPM-HELP_WI_DistributionGroupCreationandManagement.doc&action=default\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Distribution Group Creation and Management\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Pay special attention to the following parts of the document:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"-       p. 2 General Overview\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"-       p. 5 How to Manage the Distribution Group Membership\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
